tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (CD One)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT those) (NNS nights)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (DT all) (PRP I)) (VP (VBP wan) (S (VP (TO na) (VP (VB do)))))))))) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VP (VB listen) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN iPod)))) (CC and) (VP (VB hide) (PP (IN under) (NP (DT the) (NNS covers)))))) (. .)))
